name: Decay
desc: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Firestorm
desc: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

name: Fatal Bonds
desc: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

name: Chronosphere
desc: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Chaotic Offering
desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Song of the Siren
desc: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Chaos Bolt
desc: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

name: Ice Blast
desc: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Cold Embrace
desc: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.

name: Spell Shield
desc: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
